data.text: @NoticiasGeekTV @ReverseGoblin @DCEUNews The movie is not in chaos.

@NoticiasGeekTV @ReverseGoblin @DCEUNews Crazy this spin 🤣 the movie is shot and will be released accordingly people are working from home ect your looking at a movie that is 90 percent CG your clueless

@NoticiasGeekTV @ReverseGoblin @DCEUNews The movie isn’t in chaos. Ya’ll just like to paint it as something in chaos. They couldn’t release it in time so they moved it. It’s better than trying to rush everything and have a mediocre end product.
@LazerNights3 @DCEUNews It’s either going to get moved or the crew has to work literally 24/7 up until its release to finish it 🤷🏽‍♂️
@ReverseGoblin @DCEUNews Here is your problem… this movie is in caos … but WB doesn’t want to admitted https://t.co/NIKlnQvYZT

@DCEUNews @taesfatbussy Zack Snyder's Justice League had 2700 vfx shots and only had 7 months. Maybe that was because there wasn't that many movies being worked on at the time, so they could actually do it that fast? (btw the asked for 1 full year to finish the vfx, but WBs gave them only 7 months9.

@LazerNights3 @DCEUNews Oh sweetie. There is no chance that film makes its release date. At all. The amount of issues that production has had? They're kidding themselves if they think they can release it in 2022.
@LazerNights3 @DCEUNews It will probably move as well or we'll again end up getting the cartoon fight like last time. Lol https://t.co/x3i7wKkLKc
@LazerNights3 @DCEUNews Black Panther i dont think will make November. Hope it can cause im not looking forward to.mkre waiting but strong chance ot wont
